message.name: INF_NO_SANDBOX_EXISTS_FOR_THIS_PRODUCT
message.locale: The rules configuration for this product is not currently in-edit.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_PERIOD_RNFE
message.locale: A product period cannot be found with the ID supplied.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_DISPLAY_CATEGORY_RNFE
message.locale: A product display category cannot be found with the ID supplied.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_PERIOD_DISPLAY_CATEGORY_RNFE
message.locale: A product period display category cannot be found with the ID supplied.

message.name: INF_CHANGE_OF_PRODUCT_REASSESSMENT_STRATEGY
message.locale: Note: these changes include changing the reassessment strategy from '%1c' to '%2c'. The publication of this change in reassessment strategy will queue a request to execute the '%3s' batch job. An administrator must run the requested batch job to apply changes to existing product delivery cases.
